markdown:
<title level="1" right="Cantrip 1" pfs="Standard">
[Summon Instrument](/Spells.aspx?ID=1703)
<actions string="Three Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Cantrip" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=550" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 361 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 hour
</row>

</column>

---

You materialize a handheld [musical instrument](/Equipment.aspx?ID=37) in your grasp. The instrument is typical for its type, but it plays for only you. It vanishes when the spell ends. If you cast _summon instrument_ again, any instrument you previously summoned disappears.

---
**Heightened (5th)** The instrument is instead a virtuoso handheld instrument.
name: Summon Instrument

</summary>
summary: Call an instrument that only you can play.
summary_markdown: Call an instrument that only you can play.
text: Summon Instrument Three Actions Source Player Core pg. 361 2.0 Traditions Arcane, Divine, Occult Duration 1 hour --- You materialize a handheld musical instrument in your grasp. The instrument is typical for its type, but it plays for only you. It vanishes when the spell ends. If you cast summon instrument again, any instrument you previously summoned disappears. --- Heightened (5th) The instrument is instead a virtuoso handheld instrument.
